scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.develop2: concurrently "cd server && npm run a_watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: npm install && cd client && npm run build
scripts.client: wait-on tcp:3001 && cd client && npm run dev
